description: The friendly Wagner family took a school bus and made it way cooler by converting it into a Pizza Bus! You can trust that they’re pulling out all the stops when it comes to serving the wonderful flavors of Philly to all the lovely folks of Fairbanks, even in freezing weather. Come by and feast on hand-formed & stone-baked pizza with specialty toppings galore. You can also order hoagies, wings, burgers, even ice cream, and more!So the next time you’re jonesing for delicious pizza pie, just know that Wagner’s Pizza Bus is an absolute must-try.
name: Wagner's Pizza Bus
